sentences.en: Can I tempt you to another cup of tea?
sentences.cn: 我劝你再喝一杯茶 吧 !

sentences.en: Can I tempt you with a little puff pastry?
sentences.cn: 我能给你尝点泡芙点心吗？

sentences.en: Can't I tempt you to have another helping?
Don't let credit tempt you to buy something you can't afford.
sentences.cn: 不要因为可以赊购，就买超过自己支付能力的东西。

sentences.en: Having spent so long at a great club like Rangers, no other Scottish team could tempt him away.
sentences.cn: 在流浪者队这样优秀的俱乐部呆了这么久之后，其他苏格兰球队都吸引不了他了。

sentences.en: If you leave valuables in your car it will tempt thieves.
sentences.cn: 如果把贵重物品留在车上，会招来小偷的。

sentences.en: It would tempt Israel's neighbors to escalate their demands.
sentences.cn: 它将诱使以色列的邻国不断把他们的要求升级.

sentences.en: Nothing can tempt me to do such a thing.
sentences.cn: 什么也不能诱使我去做这样的事.

sentences.en: Nothing could tempt him to such a course of action.
sentences.cn: 什么都不能诱使他去那样做.

sentences.en: Nothing would tempt me to join the army.
sentences.cn: 什麽也不能引诱我参军.

sentences.en: Reducing the income will further impoverish these families and could tempt an offender into further crime.
sentences.cn: 降低收入只会使这些家庭更加贫穷，而且可能诱使不法分子进一步犯罪。

sentences.en: That must tempt them to say yes to ideas of dubious originality.
sentences.cn: 这必将诱惑他们对那些值得怀疑的原创专利说“是”。

sentences.en: The devil is said to tempt people to do wrong.
sentences.cn: 据说那个妖魔能引诱人去做坏事.

sentences.en: The football club tried to tempt the player with offers of money.
sentences.cn: 该足球俱乐部试图用金钱收买这个球员.

sentences.en: They tried to tempt her ( into staying ) with offers of promotion.
sentences.cn: 他们提出给她晋级来劝说她 ( 留下 ).

sentences.en: This is not always true, as two incomes often tempt or require you to spend more, resulting in less savings.
sentences.cn: 这并不总是正确的，因为两笔收入经常诱惑或需要你花费更多，而导致节省更少。

sentences.en: We dare not tempt them with weakness.
sentences.cn: 我们不敢以示弱去诱惑他们。

sentences.en: We fear that the removal of our shield might tempt aggression.
sentences.cn: 我们担心撤掉保护伞会鼓励侵略.

trans.tran_en: to make someone want to have or do something, even though they know they really should not

trans.tran_cn: 引诱，怂恿，吸引，冒…的风险，使感兴趣
trans.tran_en: to make someone want to have or do something, even though they know they really should not
